TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (the arrowhead mk 3,3) jep its done...thank god

Articles.Content:
okay guys here is the arrowhead mk 3,3.

after more than a month of development its done......sort of.

emty it can reach a orbit of 150 km and stil have lots of fuel left.

it hase a moving cargobay and moving ramp and they are both stock

it also has a moving locking systeem in the cargobay

toggle's:

1 engine group 1

2 engine group 2

3 the rocket engine's

4 open close the airintake's (close before lift of)

5 open close cargobay

6 open close locking systeem (does not always work)

7 arm the locking systeem

craftfile:

https://www./?e46k919do4nkl3y

Here is a challenge:"

put something in the cargobay en bring it to orbit.

Holy Mary!

That's an amazing looking cargo bay door. Pushed up with landing legs?

Holy Mary!

That's an amazing looking cargo bay door. Pushed up with landing legs?

Yep you find a how to build on my youtube channel.

Just look for "new dutchie" or go to the link on my main thread.
